project_information.project_name: Real-Time Video Virtual Try-On Application Development
project_information.job_description: We are seeking a skilled developer or development team to create a real-time video virtual try-on application. The application should allow users to virtually try on various items (e.g., clothing, accessories) using their video feed in real-time. This project will utilize the framework available at GitHub - c0ldheart/video-virtual-try-on, or https://humanaigc.github.io/outfit-anyone/, which should be integrated and possibly expanded based on our project needs.
objectives: Real-Time Interaction: Users should be able to see themselves wearing virtual items in real-time as they move in front of their camera.
High Performance: The application must perform well with low latency to ensure a smooth user experience.
User Interface: Develop a simple and intuitive user interface that allows users to select and switch between different virtual items.
Compatibility: Ensure the application is compatible across various devices and platforms, including web and mobile interfaces.
deliverables: A fully functional real-time video virtual try-on application.
Documentation detailing the architecture, technologies used, and a guide for integrating with other systems.
Source code with appropriate comments and a clear structure.
selection_criteria: Previous experience with virtual try-on technologies or similar AR projects.
Portfolio of past projects that includes work with real-time video processing.
Positive testimonials or ratings on Upwork.
proposal_requirements: Outline your approach to the project.
Provide a timeline with milestones and deliverables.
Include any questions you have about the project scope or technical aspects.

job_information.compensation: To be determined (Fixed Price or Hourly)
